name: en-wikipedia_en_for_schools_maxi
title: Wikipedia for Schools
description: A selection of about 9000 Wikipedia articles for schoolchildren, from 2021.
extra_description: Wikipedia articles chosen for primary and secondary school classrooms — to promote information literacy, digital, and research skills — in remote, rural and offline communities globally.  Curated by SolarSPELL, an educational initiative at Arizona State University.
